channel.title: Making Adverts For Servers
channel.description:
Hey Peeps , Im Currently Making Adverts For Servers .. And Then Uploading On Youtube :P
WHAT I DO:
I Make An Advert On Your Server Showing It's Features And Some Pking
WHAT CAN I DO IT FOR?
Any Server No-ip , hamachi Must Be port 43594/Default
COST :
For Making An Advert For Your Server And Uploading .. All i ask for is a copy of your server :cool:
You Get Reputation And I Get A Server To Edit Around With...
If You Would Like Me To Make An Advert Post Your Server Beneath And Ill Start Straight Away (Unless I'm Busy)

item.title: Making Adverts For Servers
item.dc:creator: @monger monger
item.description:
@monger wrote:

J:

This sounds like a scam because you’re to lazy to make your own. Who is actually gonna google for Private servers?

Err… I did before I found this place.

Don’t knock it. I am sure TONS of people do every day. This isn’t counting the people that search “rs private server” on youtube… LOL

Read full topic
